com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api

Interface JCGLContextUsableType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JCGLContextType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakeContext

    public interface JCGLContextUsableType
    The usable interface to OpenGL contexts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JCGLInterfaceGL33Type contextGetGL33() 
      JCGLImplementationType contextGetImplementation() 
      String contextGetName() 
      List<JCGLContextUsableType> contextGetShares() 
      boolean contextIsCurrent() 
      boolean contextIsSharedWith(JCGLContextUsableType c) 
      void contextMakeCurrent()
      Make this context current on the current thread.
      void contextReleaseCurrent()
      Release this context on the current thread.

    • Method Detail

      • contextGetName

        String contextGetName()
        Returns:
        The context name, for debugging purposes

      • contextGetShares

        List<JCGLContextUsableType> contextGetShares()
        Returns:
        The list of contexts with which this context is shared

      • contextIsSharedWith

        boolean contextIsSharedWith(JCGLContextUsableType c)
        Parameters:
        c - The context
        Returns:
        true iff c is shared with this context

      • contextIsCurrent

        boolean contextIsCurrent()
        Returns:
        true iff the current context is current
        See Also:
        contextMakeCurrent()

      • contextMakeCurrent

        void contextMakeCurrent()
                 throws JCGLExceptionContextIsCurrent
        Make this context current on the current thread.
        Throws:
        JCGLExceptionContextIsCurrent - If a context (including this one) is already current on this thread

      • contextReleaseCurrent

        void contextReleaseCurrent()
                    throws JCGLExceptionContextNotCurrent
        Release this context on the current thread.
        Throws:
        JCGLExceptionContextNotCurrent - If the context is not current on any thread

      • contextGetGL33

        JCGLInterfaceGL33Type contextGetGL33()
        Returns:
        The OpenGL 3.3 interface for the context

      • contextGetImplementation

        JCGLImplementationType contextGetImplementation()
        Returns:
        The implementation that owns the context
